attributes.action: Bring forward the start of the 30 hours free childcare to start immediately.
attributes.additional_details: I don’t want to see the government go back on their word. Or leave enough time for a potential new PM to come in and change this. As we have recently seen PM’s come and go all too quickly.
attributes.background:
I would like to see the current government cement their decision to 30 hours free childcare over 9 months. I would like to see it put in place with immediate effect. 
Waiting till late 2024 is far too late for the working families currently facing the energy crisis. And increased costs of living.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/634909
